name: Up And Up
description: A indie 2.5D parkour game made by one person. Make parkour in beatiful levels and find the exit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 32-bit Processor: Intel Core I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9 Series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 10 Series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9
